SA11sanss08u:364: sa ca tathāgatasya hetupratyayasaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām avataren /
SA11sanss08u:365_0: nâtra kaścid ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā yaḥ karoti pratisaṃvedayate iti
SA11sanss08u:365_1: hy akṛtām anabhisaṃskārāṃ māyādharmatām asaṃkleśadharmatāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ
SA11sanss08u:365_2: sarvadharmāṇām avataraty ādiśuddhān sarvadharmān abhiśraddadhāty adhimucyate /
SA11sanss08u:368: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr yo bodhisatvâpattim anāpattiṃ paśyati /
SA11sanss08u:380: athavā caityaṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvann aṣṭasahasraṃ japec caityapratimāyāḥ saddharmapustakānāṃ câikatamaṃ puraskṛtyâyam eva vidhir iti //
SA11sanss08u:381: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne /
SA11sanss08u:382: tad yathā krandanâdichardanadadhikṣīrâdibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati /
SA11sanss08u:385: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhâvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate /
SA11sanss08u:386: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcânantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati /
SA11sanss08u:387: yo 'pi daśâkuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatas tathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyâpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya /
SA11sanss08u:390: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhôpadhānair upatiṣṭhed /
SA11sanss08u:391_0: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhītâikapuṣpam āropayet tathāgatapūjāyai
SA11sanss08u:391_1: janâñjaliṃ côpanāmayej jalena vā siñcayed iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ câpanayed
SA11sanss08u:391_2: upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād āttamanāḥ ekakramavyatihāraṃ
SA11sanss08u:392: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavatêtimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchen nêdaṃ-
SA11sanss08u:399: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanss08u:400: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśâdhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti /
SA11sanss08u:402: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti /
SA11sanss08u:403: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ /
SA11sanss08u:405: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
SA11sanss08u:408: yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /
SA11sanss08u:409: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vâtra gambhīre buddhagocare //
SA11sanss08u:411: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrânteṣu /
SA11sanss08u:414: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahânubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
SA11sanss08u:416: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
SA11sanss08u:417: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhêndriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /
SA11sanss08u:419: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasyâittakā guṇânuśaṃsā bhavati /
SA11sanss08u:427: asthānam ānandânavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti /
SA11sanss08u:428: duḥśraddhānīyaś cânanda buddhānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ /yac ca tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi /
SA11sanss08u:431: abhūmiś câtra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvâikajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti //
SA11sanss08u:433: ye cânye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vâṣṭâṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti /
SA11sanss08u:434: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanss08u:436: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātaûpapadyema yatrâmitābhas tathāgataḥ /
SA11sanss08u:437: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:438: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyâgatya mārgam upadarśayanti /
SA11sanss08u:441: teṣāṃ tatrôpapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate /
SA11sanss08u:443: te tataś cyutêha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti /
SA11sanss08u:445: anekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
SA11sanss08u:452: yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss08u:466: prāṇâtipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ /
SA11sanss08u:468: yat pūrvântakoṭipañcagaticakrâruḍhena saṃsāranady-udyātena prāṇâtipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmâvaraṇaṃ kleśâvaraṇaṃ dharmâvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vânumoditaṃ syāt /
SA11sanss08u:469: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇâtipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvânarthaṃ mardayati /
SA11sanss08u:471: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghâyuṣkêti //
SA11sanss08u:472: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattâdānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrâsayatnenâsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati /
SA11sanss08u:475: rmikabhogânabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattâdānahetukaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti //
SA11sanss08u:476: pe //evaṃ daśâpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣâkuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante //
SA11sanss08u:481: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam /
SA11sanss08u:486: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
SA11sanss08u:487: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te //
SA11sanss08u:488: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ câdhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ //
SA11sanss08u:495: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:497: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ /
SA11sanss08u:499: evam evâikaḥ sarvajñatācittôtpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśâvaraṇalohāni pa-
SA11sanss08u:502: na ca sarvajñatācittôtpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
SA11sanss08u:503: tad yathā kulaputrâikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati /
SA11sanss08u:505_0: evam evâikaḥ sarvajñatācittôtpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvâśaye gahane 'vidyātamondhakārânugate
SA11sanss08u:505_1: praveśyate sa saha praveśito 'nabhilāpyakalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitam api karmakleśâvaraṇatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
SA11sanss08u:507: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nâsti parôpakramabhayaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:508: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭâvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nâsti durgatyapāyaparôpakramabhayam iti //
SA11sanss08u:510: ihôpāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvâhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanss08u:511: madhyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito vihared aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanss08u:512: sacen madhyâhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito bhaved aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanss08u:514: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA11sanss08u:515: tatra bodhisatvena nâtikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nâtivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss08u:516: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta /
